title: Weekly LinkedIn usage of registered users 2016
summary: During the winter months , most LinkedIn residents keep warm using 0-2_hours .
In a 2016 survey conducted by the LinkedIn Department for Business Energy & Industrial Strategy ( BEIS ) , it found that 53 percentage of respondents used this Hours of 0-2_hours .
The next most common 0-2_hours source was 3-4_hours , with a combined share of six percentage .
gold: This statistic provides information on average number of weekly hours that LinkedIn users spend on the social networking site . During a March 2016 survey , it was found that 53 percent of LinkedIn users only spend zero to two hours on the site per week .
